English: Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)

d.f: `雙子葉植物~`的~`一~`科~。`大部分~`是~`草本~，`少~`部分~`為~`木本~。`單~`葉~`互生~，`無~`托葉~。`花~`兩性~，`總狀花序~；`花瓣~`四~`枚~，`呈~`十字~`形~`排列~，`故~`稱~`為~「`十字花科~」。`常見~`的~`蔬菜~`和~`油料~`作物~，`如~`白菜~、`甘藍~、`蘿蔔~、`花椰菜~、`大頭菜~`等~，`均~`屬~`此~`科~。

English: Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)
